thread.title: customer
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by customer

author: customer
title: customer
text: Very English approach to customer service. Instead of working to rectify issue - much time spent by your rep explaining why there was little he could do. Perhaps your English customer base is accustomed to not having their issues resolved. I am not. I expected a request to reroute my order to be actioned. Instead after several hours of no response (during UK business hours) I received a long explanation why this was not possible. Oddly enough having contacted DPD couriers directly they were happy to oblige. Really poor service from your rep. Having spent Â£1000 I do not expect to return.
